entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, High Level
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:19 p.m. MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Local smoke. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 22. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 6 May 2023
